effect.short: Lowers the user's Defense, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Lowers the user's Defense, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.

flavorTexts.text:
With a hot flame on its forehead, the user hurls itself
at its target. This lowers the user’s Defense, Sp. Def,
and Speed stats.
